name: Penguin Run (itch) (Omega grim)
description:
Penguin run is a simple one button game, press jump once to jump and again while in the air to dash.  there are a few power ups that can be used to help you. Purple power ups add to your jump or dash, green powerups refresh your jump, dash or both.  Even touching the sides of the ice will let you jump again.  Red PowerUPs stop your momentum and you want be able to jump until you touch the ground or another power up.
